participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Dedicated and thoughtful, with a passion for science and a love for adventure.
participant_1.background: I have a unique way of enjoying my coffee, and I'm a dedicated worker who is still looking for the perfect partner. I love how sci fi space adventures are able to take me to other worlds and explore new possibilities. I'm not rich but I do have a lot of pictures and stories to share from my travels. I lost a patient in my arms. I don't care about social media as much as I do about my relationships with my friends and family.

participant_2.name: Lindsay
participant_2.personality: Creative and expressive, with a penchant for art and a love for adventure.
participant_2.background: I am a creative person who uses art to process my emotions. I do not treat my girlfriend very well. I am a girl who loves sports cars and video games. I am in a local theater company. I'll start my day by responding to messages from potential dates.

content.text: Doing okay! Just got back from work. I work as a barista.
Oh, that's cool! I love coffee! I'm a creative person who uses art to process my emotions.
That's awesome! What type of art do you do?
I mostly draw and paint, but I've been getting into sculpture lately.
That's really cool! I have no artistic talent, unfortunately. I'm more of a science nerd.
Science is cool too! What's your favorite thing about science?
I love how it can explain so many things about the world around us. And it's always changing and evolving, which keeps it interesting.
That's true! I love learning new things.
Me too! I'm always reading about new things.
That's awesome! I'm more of a hands-on learner, so I like to try new things and experiment.
That's cool too! I like to do both.
I think it's important to have a balance of both.
I agree! So, what's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to go to the theater, play video games, and hang out with friends.
That sounds like fun! I like to do all of those things too.
